price: We gave him good in this world, and in the Hereafter, he will surely be among the righteous[76].
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: [76] Sālihīn (righteous) are the prophets and the messengers.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhu fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
